targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by(le, juju_application, juju_model, juju_model_uuid, juju_unit) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{juju_application=~"$juju_application",juju_model=~"$juju_model",juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid",juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"}[5m])))

histogram_quantile(0.9, sum by(le, juju_application, juju_model, juju_model_uuid, juju_unit) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{juju_application=~"$juju_application",juju_model=~"$juju_model",juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid",juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"}[5m])))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(le, juju_application, juju_model, juju_model_uuid, juju_unit) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{juju_application=~"$juju_application",juju_model=~"$juju_model",juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid",juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"}[5m])))

panels.description: Pick a unit to display logs.
panels.title: Application Logs
